verses.name: Acts 15:14
verses.text: Simeon hath declared how God at the first did visit the Gentiles, to take out of them a people for his name.

verses.name: Acts 15:15
verses.text: And to this agree the words of the prophets; as it is written,

verses.name: Acts 15:16
verses.text: After this I will return, and will build again the tabernacle of David, which is fallen down; and I will build again the ruins thereof, and I will set it up:

verses.name: Acts 15:17
verses.text: That the residue of men might seek after the Lord, and all the Gentiles, upon whom my name is called, saith the Lord, who doeth all these things.
